rComments: Mcdonald is super nice, really willing to answer questions and help you out. He's not the most clear professor and he made the class much harder than it needed to be. To be fair it was his first time teaching and he's adorably dorky and excited to be teaching. However I wouldn't recommend taking his class unless chem is easy for you.

McDonald's Chem 1P almost discouraged me from the rest of chem (which I ended up doing really well in). The class itself is not hard, but he would explain something incorrrectly, and tell the class to forget what he said and would try to explain it in a different way. If I could do it again, I would skip chem 1P and just take chem 1A.

His notes and examples are quite messy, but he explains each concept rather clearly. Ask questions, and most things will be a lot clearer to you. His exam reviews, however, weren't too relevant to the actual exams. Do every WebAssign assignment and the rest of the class will be really easy.
Made easy concepts the most complicated, confusing things known to man.
